locations.description: Representative location based on a way derived from OpenStreetMap that defines part of the property limit of Via di S. Eufemia, 13.
locations.details: In 2020, Dott. A. Pizzo announced that a tract of the Servian Wall had been discovered on the grounds of the Escuela Española de Historia y Arqueología en Roma (EEHAR-CSIC) located in the Via di S. Eufemia.
